alert.note: Alert for Charleston (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Warning issued December 17 at 11:21AM EST until December 17 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Tornado Warning for portions of... Charleston County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 1145 AM EST. * At 1121 AM EST, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Cape Romain, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include: Cape Romain, Santee Coastal Reserve, Cape Island, and Lighthouse Island. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall may hide this tornado. Do not wait to see or hear the tornado. TAKE COVER NOW!
